item.title: A Very Obvious Skateboard Shaped Package
item.description: This week on Sunshine and Frank: Quebec cuts tax breaks for game studios, Watchdogs gets a graphics mod, the Steam Summer Sale arrives, we discuss E3 promises and our favorite horror games, and more.
